FuncDef: The display pm statistics command displays the collected performance statistics. The display pm statistics command displays the collected performance statistics.
CLIs: display pm statistics <taskname> data-index <index> [ instance-type <instance-type-name> [ measure <measure-name> | instance { <vpn-instance-name> } &<1-8> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the performance statistics of a specified performance statistics task.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported. The string contains letters, digits, and underscores (_), and must start with letters or digits.

Displays the performance statistics collected at a specified interval.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 16.

Specifies the type of an instance bound to a performance statistics task. The instance type is predefined in a specific feature. Each instance type maps a feature.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Displays the performance statistics based on a specified counter. The performance counter is predefined for each feature.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the name of an instance of a specific type. The format of the instance name is predefined in each feature.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-insensitive characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo: To view the existing or historical performance statistics, run the display pm statistics command. The system can display the existing performance statistics and historical performance statistics collected at a maximum of 16 intervals.
